== About Me ==

Cameron Bergh is a man from Portland Oregon in the United States.

He is organizing a Portland Ubuntu LoCoTeam called <nowiki>[[PDXTeam]]</nowiki>

I created the wiki page <nowiki>[[Installation-WindowsServerNetboot]]</nowiki> which explains how to do an ubuntu network installation by using a windows machine as a tftp and dhcp server. The howto covers Breezy and Hoary. I also mirror some of the files that this howto uses on <nowiki>[[http://www.cameronbergh.com|my website]]</nowiki>.

I am also working on a <nowiki>[[Pamphlet]]</nowiki> to aid in ubuntu evangelism.
